Text:
Thanks for the missing episode along with the conversion.

As said before, the video is perfectly acceptable although you are at an immediate disadvantage having to convert from tape to an editable format and then convert to .avi 

I think that the 'experts' out there either record directly into the computer using a TV card or save to a DVD Recorder first.

One private site I belong to offers an encoding guide and he recommends VideoReDo Plus (you can find copies on Demonoid) the FREE Gordian Knot (GK) and a XviD codec from www.koepi.org/xvid.shtml

Hope that helps
